18093102351602022738.Text: Vvardenfell has many native creatures, some more dangerous than others. The main varieties are: kwama, flying creatures, herd animals, large bipedal predators, small predators, and water creatures. Two types of creatures are particularly dangerous, because they carry disease: diseased creatures -- creatures suffering from milder local common diseases -- and blighted creatures -- creatures suffering from the more dangerous blight diseases.
